trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Mokena
There were no other sightings in Mokena on or around March 20th 2013
divs: sighting detailsat home and noticed from the corner of my vision thru a large window a mirror like finished 2ft diameter sphere @ 50 agl moving about 40 > 50 mph heading 090 ( east) lost sight went outside to the rear of my home.from when i first seen for 1\4 mile, then abrupt right turn to 180 (south) then lost sight due to obstructions. it had been traveling almost directly over laporte ave. made the abrupt right turn about over the dominick's shopping plaza.
Summary: mirror like finished 2 ft diameter sphere @ 50 AGL moving about 40 > 50 MPH heading 090 then abrupt right turn to 180 then gone
